Name: There It Is...
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Prepare garnish of blood orange slice wheel.
Review: Genever is basically a blend of whiskey and gin and in this drink combines wonderfully with Scotch as a base to which maraschino and blood orange flavour lengthen.
History: Created by yours truly in March 2014 at the Cabinet Room in London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of There It Is... contains 165 calories
